item.description:
If you've never experienced a drum circle you should join us! I've been dabbling with hand drumming for a number of years, never getting really good, but enjoying non-the-less.

You don't need a drum or musical talent or a drum, in fact your welcome to just come and listen to the rhythm. Some even consider it a form of meditation. I will bring my drum and have many small hand instruments your are welcome to try. In addition there are usually drums the facilitator shares.

The event is $5.00 - donation for room at church. Circle runs till 10:00pm, however you may leave whenever you want. Lets meet in the church - follow the sound of the drums.

Here is the "official" description: FreeDrum is a public gathering for freestyle drumming and dancing that welcomes all ages and skill levels. For those people who may not be familiar with what freestyle drumming is all about, this event focuses on spontaneous group interaction so that each individual has a say in co-creating the rhythms that everyone plays together. It is a time that encourages creativity, imagination and sharing of all kinds of personal expression.

Guys, don't be shy, this is a well attended event for men.
item.how_to_find_us: Parking lot is in back of the church. You can enter door there and follow the drum sound.
item.name: Drum Circle
